price: Yeroma gara Madyan gara galu “gooftaan kiyya karaa sirrii akka na qajeelchun kajeela” jedhe.
arabic: وَلَمَّا تَوَجَّهَ تِلۡقَآءَ مَدۡيَنَ قَالَ عَسَىٰ رَبِّيٓ أَن يَهۡدِيَنِي سَوَآءَ ٱلسَّبِيلِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: walammā tawajjaha til'qāa madyana qāla ʿasā rabbī an yahdiyanī sawāa al-sabīli
